name: WIKINDX4 OAI Plugin
short_description:
Version 1 of this plugin. It is designed to work with WIKINDX version 4 (in beta), and will produce Dublin Core XML for your site, making the resources searchable by the OAIster database here: http://www.oclc.org/oaister/
Requirements for use:

WIKINDX 4 (tested with build 499)
PHP 5.3
PHP Pear:DB
summary: OAI Plugin for the new WIKINDX4 Virtual Research Environment
